title: [Discussion]classes dates for kcet students?
content:
for jee student the classes will start from 25th right. 
what about for the round 1 and round 2 students from kcet? they will have separate induction program 

when will the classes start for them?

comments.body:
Bro I'm kcet round 1 student but i got invited to the orientation n classes(bootstrap) start for me Tom
Better u call n ask the clg
Do let me know as I am waiting for round 2
